name: Picshot Pro
description:
Do you have an eye for color?
Loooove taking nice photos?
Want to add more color to your life?

Good news ~ !

Picshot Pro is a picture taking game that asks you to find color in your day to day.

FEATURES
- uses your actual camera to play the game
- 100% super accurate color matching
- 30 levels to to start

We hope you enjoy this fun little game,
if you have any questions or suggestions please feel free to shoot us a message at
fun@simplemachine.co

Thaaaanks,
Simple Machine
